name: Cybersourceclient
tagline: A sample cybersource client using Secure Acceptance Silent Order POST
body:
Secure Acceptance Silent Order POST

This guide is written for merchants who want to customize and control their own customer checkout experience, including receipt and response pages. You will have full control to store and control customer information before sending it to CyberSource to process transactions. You will use the Business Center to review and manage all of your orders.
Using Secure Acceptance Silent Order POST requires moderate scripting skills. You must create a security script and modify your HTML form to pass order information to CyberSource. Your web site must meet the following requirements:
 Have shopping-cart or customer order creation software.
 Contain product pages in one of the supported scripting languages .
 The IT infrastructure must be Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) enabled to use SSL- based form POST submissions.
 The IT infrastructure must be able to digitally sign customer data prior to submission to Secure Acceptance.

￼

Other Prerequisites:
Access to : https://testsecureacceptance.cybersource.com/silent/pay
Cybersource Account : https://ebctest.cybersource.com/
Cybersource Secure Acceptance Silent Order POST Profile
 
How to use:

application need to be browsed using

http://localhost:8080/checkout/cybersource.do​

make sure that the servletmapping of dispatcher servlet is for *.do instead of / .

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at https://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and we’ll help you sort it out.
